## Description {#details}

The mapping of profile information to coverage data.

This is the main interface to get coverage information, using a profile to fill out execution counts.

Definition at line 980 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/profiledata/include/llvm/profiledata/coverage/coveragemapping-h">CoverageMapping.h</a>.

### getCoverageForFile() {#adaf5d4d6faed1306110085c3b7569213}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>CoverageData CoverageMapping::getCoverageForFile (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Filename) const</>}>
Get the coverage for a particular file.

The given filename must be the name as recorded in the coverage information. That is, only names returned from getUniqueSourceFiles will yield a result.

### getHashMismatches() {#a405cf9eaf25e3d4450015de2078688d7}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>ArrayRef&lt; std::pair&lt; std::string, uint64&#95;t &gt; &gt; llvm::coverage::CoverageMapping::getHashMismatches () const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
A hash mismatch occurs when a profile record for a symbol does not have the same hash as a coverage mapping record for the same symbol.

This returns a list of hash mismatches, where each mismatch is a pair of the symbol name and its coverage mapping hash.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/profiledata/include/llvm/profiledata/coverage/coveragemapping-h/#l01042">1042</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/profiledata/include/llvm/profiledata/coverage/coveragemapping-h">CoverageMapping.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getInstantiationGroups() {#ad7a02503fbcab4d7670e03d6cf3f93dc}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::vector&lt; InstantiationGroup &gt; CoverageMapping::getInstantiationGroups (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Filename) const</>}>
Get the list of function instantiation groups in a particular file.

Every instantiation group in a program is attributed to exactly one file: the file in which the definition for the common function begins.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/profiledata/include/llvm/profiledata/coverage/coveragemapping-h/#l01083">1083</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/profiledata/include/llvm/profiledata/coverage/coveragemapping-h">CoverageMapping.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/profiledata/lib/profiledata/coverage/coveragemapping-cpp/#l01456">1456</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/profiledata/lib/profiledata/coverage/coveragemapping-cpp">CoverageMapping.cpp</a>.

### getMismatchedCount() {#a0543f46cf17c15f27b1429a9fd470a35}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="unsigned llvm::coverage::CoverageMapping::getMismatchedCount () const"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
The number of functions that couldn&#39;t have their profiles mapped.

This is a count of functions whose profile is out of date or otherwise can&#39;t be associated with any coverage information.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/profiledata/include/llvm/profiledata/coverage/coveragemapping-h/#l01036">1036</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/profiledata/include/llvm/profiledata/coverage/coveragemapping-h">CoverageMapping.h</a>.

## Private Member Functions

### getImpreciseRecordIndicesForFilename() {#a62c0fd7f7063ee2342b84090d23b4ac2}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>ArrayRef&lt; unsigned &gt; CoverageMapping::getImpreciseRecordIndicesForFilename (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Filename) const</>}>
Look up the indices for function records which are at least partially defined in the specified file.

This is guaranteed to return a superset of such records: extra records not in the file may be included if there is a hash collision on the filename. Clients must be robust to collisions.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/profiledata/include/llvm/profiledata/coverage/coveragemapping-h/#l01011">1011</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/profiledata/include/llvm/profiledata/coverage/coveragemapping-h">CoverageMapping.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/profiledata/lib/profiledata/coverage/coveragemapping-cpp/#l00626">626</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/profiledata/lib/profiledata/coverage/coveragemapping-cpp">CoverageMapping.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

  labels = {["static"]}>
Load the coverage mapping from the given object files and profile.

If <code>Arches</code> is non-empty, it must specify an architecture for each object. Ignores non-instrumented object files unless all are not instrumented.
